event.title: was incorporated as a borough on May 29, 1785

data.event: Halifax was incorporated as a borough on May 29, 1785.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2007

data.event: The Legislative Route 1 Sycamore Allee is located along both sides of the road south of Halifax and on the east side of the road north of Halifax; it was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2007.
